urn:ietf:params:scim:schemas:extension:D.title: Device extension schema for DPP
urn:ietf:params:scim:schemas:extension:D.description: Extension schema for devices that support Device Provision Protocol (DPP). It contains the attributes to construct the DPP URI.

dppVersion.title: Version support
dppVersion.description: Version of DPP this device supports

bootstrappingMethod.title: Bootstrapping method
bootstrappingMethod.description: The list of all the bootstrapping methods available on the enrollee device.

bootstrapKey.title: Bootstrap key
bootstrapKey.description: This key is Elliptic-Curve Diffieâ€“Hellman (ECDH) public key. The base64 encoded length for P-256, P-384, and P-521 is 80, 96, and 120 characters.

deviceMacAddress.title: Device MAC address
deviceMacAddress.description: The MAC address assigned by the manufacturer. It is unique 48 bit value.

classChannel.title: Class channel
classChannel.description: A list of global operating class and channel shared as bootstrapping information. It is formatted as class/channel.

serialNumber.title: Serial number
serialNumber.description: An alphanumeric serial number that may also be passed as bootstrapping information.
